content: scrap basketweave scarf materials ● ~118 grams / ~284 yards dk weight scrap yarn pictured is lion brand truboo bamboo yarn in rose coral tangerine yellow celery mint seafoam thistle lilac and mauve ● 3 75 mm needles techniques ● basketweave stitch knit and purl repeats ● i-cord edges ● basic cast on ● basic cast off note knot scraps securely when moving from one to the next and tuck in ends or leave ends free if you like the slightly disheveled scrap basket look pattern cast on a multiple of 6 plus 4 stitches pictured is 34 stitches 5 sets of 6 with 2 sts on each side right side is odd row wrong side is even row row 1 slip_stitch with yarn in back knit 1 knit all stitches except/until last 2 slip st wyib purl 1 turn row 2 slip st wyib purl 1 purl all sts until last 2 slip_stitch with yarn in front purl 1 turn row 3 slip_stitch with yarn in back knit 1 *knit 1 purl 4 knit 1* repeat ** as many times as you have multiples of 6 pictured is 4 repeats 5 total sets slip_stitch with yarn in back purl 1 turn turn row 4 slip_stitch with yarn in back purl 1 *purl 1 knit 4 purl 1* repeat ** 4 times slip_stitch with yarn in front purl 1 turn row 5-6 repeat row 3-4 row 7-8 repeat row 1-2 row 9 slip st wyib knit 1 *purl 2 knit 2 purl 2* repeat ** 4 times slip st wyib purl 1 row 10 slip st wyib purl 1 *knit 2 purl 2 knit 2* repeat ** 4 times slip st wyif purl 1 row 11-12 repeat row 9-10 repeat row 1-12 until desired length to end final 3 row ending row 1-2 repeat above row 1-2 ending row 3 cast off slip st wyib knit 1 pass the first st back over and off *knit 1 pass the previous st back over and off* repeat ** until you have 2 sts remaining on left needle slip st wyib pass the previous knit st over and off purl final st pass previous st over and off cut the tail and pass through final loop and tighten weave in tail
